data.message: Loved all of Ed's albums but never had a chance to meet him, a few of his songs mean alot to me for special reasons and a chance to meet him and watch him would be amazing - "Small Bumb" was my still borns childs funeral song - "Thinking out loud" was my mums wedding song before she passed from cancer and now "supermarket flowers" is a reminder of her! - "Perfect" sums up my relationship with my partner! - would be an honour to meet him!
